attributes.action: Set up a body to support those requiring critical care in a crisis or pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: The impact has been huge for these patients and we must not forget those people within the pandemic no's.  Should a crisis hit in future these people should be ring fenced and cared for by a body set up to solely manage their care and communication.  The body will be responsible for maintaining a superior level of openness and communication and have the ability to expedite the care for those that critically need it. With a dedicated budget and care facilities.
attributes.background: That a body is put in place to safe-guard the treatment of those who are affected by life threatening illnesses i.e. cancer.  And that should a further pandemic hit, that body dedicates their role to ensuring this group receive a special level of communication, support and attention

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549642
